title: Characterization of black carbon and silica nanoparticles interactions with human plasma proteins
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00773A, Communication
Sisi Chen, Hong-Juan Chen, Xuewen Guo, Wei-juan Zheng, Hong-Zhen Lian
The tiny particles of atmospheric ultrafine particles (PM0.1) will rapidly bind with large amounts of proteins to form a protein corona when entering into human blood. However, PM0.1 is a...
